title: What increases magnetic field inside solenoid

content.prompt:
Which of the following will increase the magnetic field on the axis of a long solenoid?

  1. Increasing the current in the solenoid

  2. Increasing the cross-sectional area of the solenoid

  3. Inserting an iron core into the solenoid

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
